detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this SWDD.

In the Grafana overall memory of ECU_Diag is given. The above value is obtained from MAPVIEWER.

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The verification of the SWDD is performed by review. The review template can be found here [CA050003801 SDD Review Template]. The review results can be found here [SDD Review Results]

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The functions of MeasureValues are tested automatically by a SWATT test. The test is present under GW_Conti_MV.c.test,GW_MEASUREVALUES.c.test,GW_MeasureValues_EthDiag.c.test,iSBBR_MeasureValues.c.test,MFL_MeasureValues.c.test,KLR_MeasureValues.c.test.
